snippet: Federal investigators have questioned a man about letters laced with ricin that were mailed to President Obama and Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg, but no arrest has been made.
abstract: Federal authorities say investigation into threatening letters laced with ricin that were mailed to Pres Obama and New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg led them to question Army veteran Nathaniel D Richardson in New Boston, Tex.

byline.contributor: Michael S. Schmidt contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Federal investigators have questioned a man about letters laced with ricin that were mailed to President Obama and Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg, but no arrest has been made.

headline.main: Inquiry Into Obama and Bloomberg Ricin Letters Leads to Search of a Texas House
headline.print_headline: Inquiry Into Obama and Bloomberg Ricin Letters Leads to Search of a Texas House
